actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Energy and the Environment

official_title: A bill amending the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to authorize incremental bonding for surface mining reclamation projects.

summary.text: Amends the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to provide that the performance bond furnished by an applicant for surface coal mining and reclamation operations may be limited to coverage of land upon which such operations are actually to be conducted, and may cover specific limited phases of reclamation within the permit area.

titles.title: A bill amending the Surface Mining Control and Reclamation Act of 1977 to authorize incremental bonding for surface mining reclamation projects.
